auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

ai.welcome: Hello, I'm BankBugger — your AI banking sidekick with attitude.
ai.welcomeSubtitle: Need to check your balance, decode your transactions, plot your next big investment, or just chat about why your coffee costs more than your ETF gains? I've got you.
ai.welcomeBuiltBy: Built by the minds behind Global Dot Bank and The Dot Protocol Co., Ltd and powered by OpenAI and Cursor V0, I'm here to make banking feel less like paperwork and more like power moves.
ai.welcomeCTA: Let's make your money smarter. What can I bug for you today?
ai.investmentOptions: What investment options do you have?
ai.interestRates: What are your current interest rates?

landing.heroDescription: A modern, borderless fiat-only bank built for today's digital-first world. Safe, fast, and secure — banking redefined.

instantAccountOpening.title: Instant Account Opening
instantAccountOpening.shortDesc: Open an account in minutes with just your phone number.
instantAccountOpening.expandedDesc: Say goodbye to paperwork and long queues. With Global Dot Bank, your phone number is all you need to start. Complete your KYC digitally, get verified in minutes, and begin banking instantly from anywhere in the world.

transparentFixedDeposits.title: Transparent Fixed Deposits
transparentFixedDeposits.shortDesc: See clear, compliant FD terms & returns.
transparentFixedDeposits.expandedDesc: We believe in transparency from day one. Our fixed deposit plans come with clear interest rates, maturity timelines, and legally compliant certificates that you can download anytime.

seamlessTransfers.title: Seamless Transfers
seamlessTransfers.shortDesc: Transfer funds locally and globally with ease.
seamlessTransfers.expandedDesc: Send and receive money across the globe with just a few taps. Whether it's paying vendors, receiving customer payments, or sending money to family, Global Dot Bank supports instant transfers across multiple currencies.

globalTrust.title: Global Trust
globalTrust.shortDesc: Backed by Dot Protocol Co., Ltd with international standards.
globalTrust.expandedDesc: Operated under Dot Protocol Co., Ltd — a registered and trusted technology company — Global Dot Bank meets international business and compliance standards.

secureBanking.title: Secure Banking
secureBanking.shortDesc: Your data and funds protected with bank-grade security.
secureBanking.expandedDesc: Your privacy and funds are our top priority. We use end-to-end encryption, real-time fraud detection, biometric verification, and 2FA to ensure that your account is protected 24/7.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.shortDesc: Real human support whenever you need it.
support.expandedDesc: No chatbots here. Global Dot Bank offers always-on support from trained professionals ready to assist you — day or night.

savings.title: Savings Account
savings.shortDesc: Secure, seamless, and suited for your everyday needs.
savings.expandedDesc: Experience smart, secure savings like never before. Our Savings Account gives you instant access, no hidden fees, and high interest rates that beat traditional banks.
benefits: Auto-sweep to FD for idle balances
Real-time mobile control of your money

current.title: Current Account
current.shortDesc: Built for businesses and professionals who move fast.
current.expandedDesc: Whether you're a freelancer, a founder, or a full-scale enterprise, our Current Account delivers unmatched flexibility and reliability.
benefits: Zero hidden fees on monthly transactions
Dedicated relationship manager for business accounts

fixedDeposit.title: Fixed Deposit Account
fixedDeposit.shortDesc: Lock in your funds. Watch your money grow faster, smarter.
fixedDeposit.expandedDesc: Get the highest fixed deposit returns in the market, with fully transparent terms. Whether short-term or long-term, we offer flexible tenures and attractive compound interest rates.
benefits: Auto-renew or break FD with no penalties
Secure digital certificates for every deposit

corporate.title: Corporate Account
corporate.shortDesc: Enterprise-grade banking for companies of all sizes.
corporate.expandedDesc: Global Dot Bank's Corporate Account is designed for modern companies operating across borders. From startups to multinationals, we offer a full-suite solution.
benefits: Real-time global transfers at low cost
24/7 support with assigned corporate success manager

junior.title: Junior Account
junior.shortDesc: Banking for the next generation – safe, guided, and fun.
junior.expandedDesc: Teach your children financial literacy the smart way. Junior Accounts are co-managed with parents and allow goal-based saving, smart card spending, and milestone rewards.
benefits: Goal tracking: Save for school, birthdays, more
Reward system for good saving habits

pension.title: Pension Account
pension.shortDesc: Retire with dignity. Bank with peace of mind.
pension.expandedDesc: Our Pension Account is crafted for retirees who want simplicity, safety, and consistent returns. Enjoy auto-deposit of pensions, FD-linked savings, and free withdrawal options.
